title: Here's help
creator_credit: James Berry, Associated Film Consultants and Mike Mansfield
brief_description: Surveys the drug scene in America and the treatment now available. Stresses that people’s own inadequacies and problems lead to drug taking which can be regarded as a social sickness. Lists types of help available from a variety of organisations. Includes comments from addicts and parents whose children have taken drugs.
